subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Road
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: In the Alps, the rider who looked like he had the Tour wrapped up lost time to Nairo Quintana going into the final day of racing before Sunday’s essentially processional stage into Paris.
snippet: In the Alps, the rider who looked like he had the Tour wrapped up lost time to Nairo Quintana going into the final day of racing before Sunday’s essentially processional stage into Paris.
